node_type.code:
debugState === 'paused' ? ( variables.length > 0 ? ( variables.map((variable, index) => (
{variable.name} {variable.value} {variable.type}
)) ) : (
No variables in current scope
) ) : (
Pause debugging to inspect variables
)

breakpoints.length > 0 ? ( breakpoints.map(breakpoint => (
toggleBreakpoint(breakpoint.id)} />
Line {breakpoint.line}
{breakpoint.file}
)) ) : (
No breakpoints set. Click in the gutter to add one.
)

watchExpressions.length > 0 ? ( watchExpressions.map(watch => (
{watch.expression} {watch.error ? `Error: ${watch.error}` : watch.value}
)) ) : (
Add expressions to watch their values
)
